sentences.en: His spade cleaved the firm sand with a satisfying crunch.
sentences.cn: 他的锹凿开了坚实的砂土,发出令人舒心的嘎扎声.

sentences.en: People who crunch nuts at the movies can be very annoying.
sentences.cn: 看电影时嘎吱作声地嚼干果的人会使人十分讨厌.

sentences.en: She heard the crunch of tires on the gravel driveway.
sentences.cn: 她听到轮胎轧过石子铺成的车道，发出嘎吱声。

sentences.en: She sucked an ice cube into her mouth, and crunched it loudly.
sentences.cn: 她把一冰块儿含在嘴里，并嘎吱嘎吱地大声嚼起来。

sentences.en: Some mid - market houses say they are well - positioned for the credit crunch.
sentences.cn: 一些 中型 市场收购基金表示,它们有能力应对信贷紧缩.

sentences.en: The credit crunch and the strong dollar have cut foreign sales.
sentences.cn: 信贷危机和强势美元削减了海外销售.

sentences.en: The credit crunch is not passing by without a trace, however.
sentences.cn: 信贷紧缩不会毫无原由地发生了.

sentences.en: The credit crunch may also be having lingering effects.
sentences.cn: 信贷动荡也许还存在延续效应.

sentences.en: the crunch of feet on snow
sentences.cn: 脚踩着雪发出的嘎吱嘎吱声

sentences.en: The only sound was the crunch of tyres on gravel.
sentences.cn: 唯一的声音是轮胎压在砂砾上的嘎吱声。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister is expected to call a crunch meeting on Monday.
sentences.cn: 预计首相将于周一召开紧急会议。

sentences.en: Their boots crunched loudly on the frozen snow.
sentences.cn: 他们的靴子踩在冻结的雪上发出嘎吱嘎吱的响声。

sentences.en: There was the crunch of footsteps.
sentences.cn: 传来了嗄吱嗄吱的脚步声.

sentences.en: This saved them from the worst of the subprime - related credit crunch.
sentences.cn: 这使得他们避免了次贷危机的损失.
明天可就是紧要关头了。

sentences.en: What became known , with irresistible alliteration, as the credit crunch had begun.
sentences.cn: 然而事实是,不可避免的, 信贷危机开始了.

sentences.en: You never know when the next job crunch will come.
sentences.cn: 谁也不能预知下一次的求职风暴什么时候会到来.

words.tran_cn: 易碎的；发嘎吱嘎吱声的
压碎；嘎扎嘎扎的咬嚼；扎扎地踏过

phrases.tran_cn: 信贷紧缩；信贷危机（等于credit crisis）

trans.tran_cn: 嘎吱嘎吱地嚼/行进，（使）嘎吱作响，（用计算器等大量）处理（数字）
trans.tran_en: to eat hard food in a way that makes a noise
a noise like the sound of something being crushed
